metadata.title: CVE-2021-38604 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In librt in the GNU C Library (aka glibc) through 2.34,sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/mq_notify.c mishandles certain NOTIFY_REMOVED data,leading to a NULL pointer dereference. NOTE: this vulnerability wasintroduced as a side effect of the CVE-2021-33574 fix.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
